  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging used by com.telenav.kivakit.application 
    Class Description
    Broadcaster
    Broadcasts a message to zero or more listeners via Broadcaster.transmit(Transmittable).
    Listener
    Handles messages through Transceiver.onHandle(Transmittable) by receiving them through the Listener.receive(Transmittable) method unless the listener Listener.isDeaf(), meaning that it is discarding messages it receives.
    Repeater
    A repeater is both a Listener and a Broadcaster, receiving messages in Repeater.receive(Transmittable) and rebroadcasting them to its own listeners with Broadcaster.transmit(Transmittable).
    Transceiver
    Functionality that is common to Broadcasters, Listeners, Repeaters and potentially other classes that are involved in handling messages.

  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.messaging used by com.telenav.kivakit.resource.reading 
    Class Description
    Broadcaster
    Broadcasts a message to zero or more listeners via Broadcaster.transmit(Transmittable).
    Listener
    Handles messages through Transceiver.onHandle(Transmittable) by receiving them through the Listener.receive(Transmittable) method unless the listener Listener.isDeaf(), meaning that it is discarding messages it receives.
    Repeater
    A repeater is both a Listener and a Broadcaster, receiving messages in Repeater.receive(Transmittable) and rebroadcasting them to its own listeners with Broadcaster.transmit(Transmittable).
    Transceiver
    Functionality that is common to Broadcasters, Listeners, Repeaters and potentially other classes that are involved in handling messages.
